definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: The book written by Mark Twain is very popular with the young students all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 那本馬可土溫寫的書深受世界各地青年學生的歡迎。

sentences.english: Dissipation increased with soil temperature and decreased with increasing depth in the soil profile.
sentences.chinese: 消散隨土溫增加，隨土壤剖面變深而減少。
